name: Patricia KAPLAN and Howell Kaplan, h/w, Petitioners v. DON'S CHARTER & TOUR SERVICE, INC. and William Clapp, Respondents v. Agency Rent-A-Car and Jerry Dicker, Respondents
name_abbreviation: Kaplan v. Don's Charter & Tour Service, Inc.

parties: Patricia KAPLAN and Howell Kaplan, h/w, Petitioners v. DON’S CHARTER & TOUR SERVICE, INC. and William Clapp, Respondents v. Agency Rent-A-Car and Jerry Dicker, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 21st day of May, 2001, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby granted, limited to the following question:
Whether defense counsel’s references to hearsay in the presence of the jury were so egregious and patently prejudicial as to require the grant of a new trial.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
776 A.2d 265
Patricia KAPLAN and Howell Kaplan, h/w, Petitioners v. DON’S CHARTER & TOUR SERVICE, INC. and William Clapp, Respondents v. Agency Rent-A-Car and Jerry Dicker, Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 21, 2001.
